greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k)=(n+k)!/k! (0<=k<=n-1; n>=1).
comment: T(n,n-1)=(2n-1)!/(n-1)! (A000407); T(n,0)=n! (A000142); Row sums yield A092956; Arithmetic means of the rows yield A001761.
Has many diagonals in common with A068424. - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 14 2006
maple: T:=proc(n,k) if k<n then (n+k)!/k! else 0 fi end: for n from 1 to 9 do seq(T(n,k),k=0..n-1) od;# yields sequence in triangular form
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 18 2005
